pages.text: A strange gunpowder must get from $(9)creeper who strucked on lightning$().When using it, you can summon a lightning . You can never hide from him , even under earth.

pages.title: Charged Gunpowder
pages.text: It is not easy to find a creeper hit by lightning in a thunderstorm , then kill it , Even if you use channeling enchantment , the efficiency is still not high.$(br)  I heard that in $(3)the palace of the deep sea$().The king there hides $(l:goldens_additions:misc/channelingex)a powerful enchantment that can lead thunder in sunny days$().If you can get it , you have only one thing to do is  finding creepers

pages.title: King of Deep
pages.text: It is said that this is the portrait of the king.
